alert.note: Alert for Day; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 1:30AM MDT until April 22 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of two to four inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Locally higher gusts possible. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse County. In South Dakota, Marshall, Roberts and Day Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...IMPACTS...Plan on slick spots on roads. The combination of snow and gusty winds will create blowing snow, reducing visibilities at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
